text: The three 3D8 scFv lines and the one mutant 3D8 scFv line were challenged with HSV - 1 : : GFP and PRV which had dsDNA as a genome . Virus - infected HeLa cells express GFP in the cytoplasm after HSV infection [ 30 ] and PRV infection results in cytopathic effects ( CPE ) in HeLa cells . In addition , PRV results in multinuclear giant cell formation as a PRV CPE [ 31 ] .
